verses.verse: A psalm written by David for the choir director, to be accompanied by stringed instruments; it was written when the people of Ziph went to Saul and told him that David was hiding in their area. God, by your power save me from my enemies, and show people that I have not done anything that is wrong!
God, listen to my prayer; listen to what I say to you
because strangers are trying to attack me; proud men are wanting to kill me, men who have no respect for you.
But God is the one who helps me; Yahweh defends me from my enemies.
He will cause the evil things that they want to do to me to happen to them instead; because you faithfully do what you have promised to me, destroy them.
Yahweh, I will gladly give an offering to you because I want to, and I will thank you, for you are good to me;
you have rescued me from all my troubles, and I have seen that you have defeated my enemies.
